title: CS 577 + Math 340 or CS 577 + Stat 324
body: I’m a CS major and going to take CS 577 next semester. I know CS 577 is a challenging course, but I am not sure which math course to take with it next semester. I was wondering which course to take between Math 340 and Stat 324.
comments: Personally I think MATH 340 is easier than STAT 324. Whether you need spend a lot of time in CS 577 depends on your intuition skills.
